remarks: Value of the set of absolute values.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
abvfval.a $e |- A = ( AbsVal ` R ) $.
abvfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
abvfval.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
abvfval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
abvfval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
abvfval $p |- ( R e. Ring -> A = { f e. ( ( 0 [,) +oo ) ^m B ) | A. x e. B ( ( ( f ` x ) = 0 <-> x = .0. ) /\ A. y e. B ( ( f ` ( x .x. y ) ) = ( ( f ` x ) x. ( f ` y ) ) /\ ( f ` ( x .+ y ) ) <_ ( ( f ` x ) + ( f ` y ) ) ) ) } ) $.
$d .+ f $.
$d .0. f $.
$d .x. f $.
$d B f x y $.
$d R f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d x y $.
